DOC.brief_summary: Methamphetamine abuse steadily increase past decade . Rivastigmine medication may helpful treat methamphetamine dependence . The purpose study evaluate effectiveness rivastigmine treat methamphetamine dependent individual .
DOC.detailed_description: Methamphetamine powerful stimulant affect central nervous system . Chronic methamphetamine use often lead psychotic behavior . Rivastigmine acetylcholinesterase inhibitor currently approve treat Alzheimer's-related dementia . The purpose study assess efficacy rivastigmine treat methamphetamine dependent individual . Participants randomly assign either one two dose level rivastigmine placebo 12 week . Participants assess cardiovascular , subjective , reinforce effect produce methamphetamine . All participant partake contingency management session Week 4 .
